document_data.name: The Masked Minstrel
document_data.Description: The Masked Minstrel, as her name implied, only appeared in public while wearing a [[mask (object)|mask]] to conceal her identity. She was also a "lady of the evening" who entertained clients in the woods of [[Mount Waterdeep]]. Rumors said that she was an agent of the [[Harpers]] or a spy.
document_data.Skills: The Masked Minstrel had a lovely voice and played the [[harp]], [[lyre]], and [[lute]].
